tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Finding a good doctor for a baby is every mother’s dream and relief. He is such doctor, gem of a person.
I am seeing him since my daughter’s birth and I don’t listen to anyone but Dr. vikas. Very patient, very positive, very encouraging. He will look at baby’s face (color, skin, dullness) and tell the problem.
I don’t know how many times I cried before him worrying my baby’s health *** ** **** ** **** ***** **** *** * *** **** **** ** ******* ** *** ****** ***** *** *** ****** *** *** *****
Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is very good and ,I like the way he is treats the patience and spends time.  My personal request to Dr Vikas would be of he can consult somewhere else apart from motherhood. I will be the happiest person to go there. 

Motherhood is a mess in managing the time slots and appointments, they have an excuse every time and they say this is one off's . I have been there 8-9 times and every time its the same story.

Thye have issue wit their systems every time I have visited and they say today the system is slow.

They just lie to you on your face, this has been my experience this time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: highly recommended pediatrician. Jut the kid meeting him will make the parents and kid feel better. he has been our Pediatrician from a since our boy has been 6 months. Our son 2qs having frequent fevers after 8 months, the fever would come ever 30 days. he diagnosed it properly by following protocol and identified that he has Hydronephrosis and refered to a good urologist to find the root cause and provide proper consultantation. he just did not stop there he was with us through out the root cause analysis and kept following up with imus through his coordinator or whenever he was able to meet us or through the doctor he refered us to. he was up to date when ever we met him. these are the kind who should become doctors. fantastic human being.

tags: None
review: We started consulting Dr. Satwik from the baby my baby was born and was in NICU ( preemie at 34 weeks) His attitude is so positive and encouraging for new mothers. He believes in real time practical solution of problems rather than giving long story to patients. he is patient enough to listen to all your doubts with a smile and is extremely good with vaccination shots. his availability without appointment can be a challenge but his response to emails is always a boon. I strongly recommend him to all new age parents who want to consult a practical doctor yet very modern in his advice. trust me your baby is in safe hands !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
We wanted to like Dr. Satwik and his clinic, but after 3 visits for vaccinations we can't recommend his care if you have other options.

The good:
The clinic is clean and everyone is trying vary hard. It is attached to Motherhood so you have access to any facilities you could want including a pharmacy and specialists. Dr. Satwik is technically excellent so if you don't have any other option at least know his medical training is top notch.

The bad:
We always call ahead because we are travelling quite far, but we always wind up waiting and need to be "squeezed in". It's not surprising given how busy they are, but another good reason to find a smaller clinic. Some easy ways to improve service include 1) vaccination days, 2) allow child measuring, pharmacy pickup, and checkin to be done simultaneously, and 3) have enough doctors on staff to accommodate overruns.

I am a high stress first time mother, but I do not appreciate metal health diagnosis from a non-psychiatrist doctor or his staff. We've been here 3 times and aside from the first visit Dr. Satwik hasn't listened preferring "just do this" and don't ask why answers.

*** ******* ********* ** **** *** ****** **** *** **** ** ***** *** ****** ** ** ****** ** *** ***** *** ***** *** ********* Children are not all the same and if what you're doing is upsetting the child, give us a moment to calm him or try something else yourself. ***** ******* **** *** ******* *** **** ** *** **** *** ********** ** *** * ***** ********* The staff member was also quite rough.

***** **** ** *** ***** ************** ** **** ***** *** *** *** ******* ********** *** ***** ***** *** **** *******. Dr. Satwik please consider our suggestions ******* **** ******* ***** ** ******* ** *** *** ** **** **** *** ********* *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Was referred to him for admitting extreme preterm baby in NICU! Expect for his presence at the time of delivery, he never met us parents after that. Although we paid a heavy fee for all the days he "consulted" the preterm baby!!  Terrible NICU experience, none  of the doctors took responsibility* **** ****** ******* **** ******, had no clarity on the kind of infection the baby succumbed to despite heavy blood tests and analysis with exorbitant costs. **** ******** ******** ***** *** **** **** ** ***** ** ** ********** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I met this doctor when I took my daughter for jaundice treatment. He spent about 10 mins explaining things to me and I was very happy with his approach and friendliness! 
A week later I was recommended by Dr Sai to go to motherhood Hebbal blr for a test of biotin for mt daughter ! I met this dr again on 22 nd. I was wrongly billed 3100 for a test that costed 500. .upon clarifying with him he got offended and started talkin to me with a high tone saying I’m not allowed to record anything without his consent. He started talking about how it is not admissible in the court of law! My husband and I were shocked how he spoke like this for no reason in fron to ten other parents ! I even offered to show my phone for proof ! But he kept saying “
M just informing u” 
** ***** ** ***** *** ** ****** *** **** ******** **** ****** ! Bitter and disappointing experience. Very rude man

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
He’s fabulous!! Super cordial with us parents and great with the baby! He is so quick with vaccination shots, our baby is back in our arms within 30 seconds! 

Our baby has had cow milk protein allergy when he was 25 days old and Dr Vikas was very efficient in diagnosing it and recommending next steps for me to be able to continue breastfeeding. Thanks to his guidance, I’m still able to breastfeed my baby at 7 months. 

He doesn’t shy away from referring to relevant specialists when needed, in our case a pediatric gastroenterologist. I’d recommend Dr Vikas to all new parents, your baby will get the best care under him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ****** ** ******* *** * **** ************ ** ********** ** ** *** ***** ******* Firstly, his consultation is so friendly that he makes both baby and parents very comfortable. He closely listens to all details and analyses the root cause. He prescribes medicines only when required. Even with his busy schedule, he keeps track of baby's health and is available on-call (or on msg) when we have any questions or in case of any emergency.

We are very lucky to have him here in India, who has worked several years with NHS, UK.

He is more of a family doctor for us now. Very thankful to him for taking right care of our kid and giving the best possible advise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First time I visited to vikas sir for a normal health checkup of my 9year old daughter.  In my opinion he is a very good doctor, very friendly with the patient, well beheviour doctor, and also he has the patience to listen .i m mostly satisfied with his well beheviour , thank u sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have had multiple visits to the doctor and he has lots of patience to hear out the new parent questions and doubts and answers them all without rushing. I would recommend the doctor mainly because he wouldn't suggest mesdication unless required. His diagnosis is very broad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been seeing Dr. Vikas  over a year now...he gives practical advice and a very approachable Dr who makes your interaction comfortable. Gives lot of time to understand things from your perspective and gives advice which s suitable for u...we consult him for both our kids and are very comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would definately recommend Dr. Vikas. The care what he gives to the babies is much appreciated. And the more important part is to convey the things to the parents is so pleasing that every parents comes out of the room with smiling face. Thumbs up to Dr. Vikas

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr, Vikas, is a Great doctor and a very patience listener, seldom you will get such a doctor who will sit and clear all your doubts, in this world where even medicine is no longer a Noble profession and you see doctors meeting patients as a part of a factory conveyor belt, Dr. Vikas stands out and i bet once you take your child to him, you will not look for any other doctor in Hebbal area.

Keep up the good work Doctor

Regards
Gagan

tags: None

He takes time to hear and solve all our problems. Hoping that many children will benefit from his practice ** *** **** ********** ****** ** **********

tags: None
review: Doctor gave a clear and practical explanation on the problem. He also suspected there could be urine infection​ and gave a test. With the test results, he said not to worry and things are very much normal. Best part is he explains all the things well and makes very sure that he is relying on the test reports rather than the verbal things.

tags: None
review: I would def recommend Dr Vikas for any pediatric related concerns. Hes very humble and gentle. You can approach him any time and there's a reply from him. tries to treat the child with mild medication and not suggest antibiotic. I can't think of any other Dr for my son. Lots and loads of Thanks to Dr  Vikas

tags: None
review: He is the best in treating infants and kids. He takes care and looks all the possibilities  and recommends natural methods as well. He doesn't insist unnecessary  medications.  ** ** *** **** ************* * *** **** *** ** **** * ****** Wonderful and excellent doctor.  Parents worry vanishes if they meet him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Vikas Satwik saved my child's life with his timely intervention. She was brought back in, in a very critical condition soon after birth and discharge from Motherhood Hebbal. He spent the entire night by her side, taking all the necessary steps to stabilize her, before arranging for her transfer to a tertiary care centre for surgery. We are eternally grateful to him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had a fabulous visit with Dr. Satwik yesterday. Instantly, he made us feel so comfortable and treated our son with the utmost care. He is extremely kind and takes time with each patient. 

In the past, we had been to various pediatricians in Bangalore and never had such a pleasant experience, as we did with Dr. Satwik.  

I highly recommend Dr. Satwik to other parents, especially to newborn parents who are looking for a doctor they can trust!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly and also eases the parents by explaining about the infant very nicely. He removes all the fears that generally parents get about the new borns. Doctor speaks very nicely and explains all our doubts very patiently. Doctor interacts with babies as his own kid.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vikas is a pediatric for both my daughters. He is amazing. He knows his work.  Super well behaved. Always a smile on his face. He remembers all patients. He gives all the required informations. He is never in a hurry. Always takes time to listen to your problems. He is one chilled out doctor I have seen in my life. I just love him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************** We were stressed about our daughter's weight. He put our mind at ease by suggesting a feeding schedule that helped both the baby and mother. I was dreading vaccinations, but he made vaccinations also seem so easy, by pacifying my baby himself.

Would definitely recommend him to all parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Consultation provided for newborns ,Neonatology -preterm follow up,All Pediatric Problems ,
review:
Dr Vikas is just Awesome from the day 1 we met.

Very friendly and provided mental support when my baby was in NICU. It's very much required for new parents. Thank you so much Doctor for all your care n suggestions.

He always encourage and explains the problem with solution. I really liked his quick decision making technique, which works well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very experienced *** *************. Easy to approach and takes the time to explain everything in detail. Amazing at baby handling, I could close my eyes and leave my daughter in his hands! Also gives you more practical, logical and simple advices that are easier to follow rather than typical textbook responses.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Being a new parent we were unaware of our child's growth rate or feeding requirements etc. The doctor was very friendly and explained every treatment before implementing. He also recommended the right course of action and helped improve our new born's health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Vikas Satwik has been our baby's pediatrician since her  birth at motherhood hospital Sahakarnagar. He is an exceptionally gifted doctor who listens patiently to all the concerns of the parent before evaluating the child and prescribes effective medication. He also goes the extra mile and provides timely advice and right references of specialists for certain specific concerns. He is a very positive person and gives parents the much needed reassurance when faced with few challenging medical conditions. His utmost dedication to the medical profession is very evident in his demeanor and approach towards the patient which sets him notches above all the pediatricians we have visited in India and abroad. Even the way he has set up his consultation room makes it look more child friendly and puts the nervous little ones at ease. Yes the waiting time can sometimes be long but for a doctor of this calibre I wouldn't mind the waiting because I'm assured that my baby is in good hands.

tags: None
review: We have been very happy with Dr. Vikas - who had been the pediatrician for our boy right from his birth. Dr. V is especially patient with the baby and the parents - and his calm and friendly demeanor is greatly appreciated. He always has the time to listen to our (sometimes crazy) anxieties - as is perhaps normal for every first time parent. Greatly recommended.

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My baby has conginital heart issue and Dr. Vikas is seeing my baby from the day he was born till day (2yrs). He takes full care to follow up with my cardiologist on how my baby is progressing to what kind of medications given and discusses what could best and then given medicine.

Best part of Dr  Vikas is he uses positive and good words to create hope in us. And listens patiently to us  before giving medication to my baby

Thanks Dr Vikas

Regards
Sireesha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was really very happy and relieved to talk to Dr Vikas.... he was really patient to describe everything and clarify my concerns about my daughter... there was no hurry in his office and he spent enough time with us....the other thing I liked was he didn't jump into prescribing medications... instead he asked me to look for the cues and only if required, then will he start his course of treatment... thank you doc
